subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Darren Bent delivered Tottenham’s first point of the season in a hard-fought 1-1 draw Sunday at Chelsea, while Liverpool tied, 0-0, at Villa to end its perfect start to the season.
snippet: Darren Bent delivered Tottenham’s first point of the season in a hard-fought 1-1 draw Sunday at Chelsea, while Liverpool tied, 0-0, at Villa to end its perfect start to the season.
